title: Fettuccine with Creamy Roasted Beet Sauce

Ingredients.2: 1 small sweet onion, cut into quarters

Ingredients.13: 1 tablespoon shredded Parmesan cheese, or to taste

Ingredients.14: 1 pinch chopped fresh thyme, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: Combine beets, onion, and garlic cloves in a bowl. Add olive oil, thyme, salt, and pepper; toss to coat. Transfer to a baking sheet.

Directions.3: Roast in the preheated oven until cooked through and tender, about 1 hour.

Directions.4: Remove from the oven and let cool until beets can be handled, 10 to 15 minutes. Remove beet skins.

Directions.5: Transfer mixture to a food processor. Add vegetable broth and lemon juice; pulse until smooth. Transfer to a saucepan.

Directions.6: Stir heavy cream into the beet mixture in the saucepan. Cook over medium-low heat until it begins to simmer, about 5 minutes. Stir in 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese until melted. Set aside.

Directions.7: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil. Cook fettuccine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes. Drain and return to the pot. Pour beet sauce over pasta and toss until well combined. Top with 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese and a pinch of additional thyme.
